CustomField.formula:
SUBSTITUTE( IF(Has_Compelling_Event__c = TRUE, "A, ", NULL) +
IF(Has_Budget__c = TRUE, "B, ", NULL) +
IF(Has_Verbal_Approval__c = TRUE, "C, ", NULL) +
IF(Docs_in_Review_legal__c = TRUE, "D, ", NULL) +
IF( Management_Proforma_Deal__c = TRUE, "Proforma, ", NULL) + ".", ", .", NULL)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: A: Has Compelling Event B: Has Budget C: Has Verbal Approval D: Docs In Review (legal)
CustomField.label: Management Criteria Met
